All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCacheOperations<K,V>
 
Action
Represents an action performed by an AI agent on a specific task within the AI-Agent Framework.
Agent
Annotation to mark and configure methods as AI agent tasks within the AI-Agent framework.
AgentDefination
AgentDefination represents the definition and metadata of an AI agent within the AI-Agent Framework.
AgentHistory
Represents the complete history of actions taken by an AI agent, organized by goals and tasks.
AgentPool
Abstract class representing a pool of AI agents registered under a specific category or type.
AgentRegister
Spring BeanPostProcessor implementation responsible for registering AI agents within the AI-Agent framework.
AiAgent
Marker interface to designate a class as an AI Agent within the AI-Agent framework.
ApiHub
Entry point for the AI-Agent Framework application.
ApiHubException
Base abstract exception class for the AI-Agent Framework.
Cache<K,V>
Cache interface designed for fast in-memory access and modular extension within the Enterprise AI Agent Execution and Orchestration Platform.
CacheConfiguration
Configuration class for cache initialization in the Enterprise AI Agent Execution and Orchestration Platform.
CacheOperations<K,V>
Defines operations for synchronizing cache data with an underlying persistent or distributed cache source in the AI-Agent Execution and Orchestration Platform.
CacheRefresher
A scheduled component responsible for managing and refreshing multiple cache instances within the AI-Agent Execution and Orchestration Platform.
Condition
 
ConfigurationException
Exception thrown when the AI-Agent Framework encounters configuration-related issues.
DataSourceConfig
Configuration class for SQL Database connectivity and integration within the Ai-Agent framework.
Environment
The Environment interface defines the central contract for the AI-agent framework.
EnvironmentLoader
EnvironmentLoader is the primary abstract implementation of the Environment interface within the AI-agent framework.
EnvironmentState
Represents the runtime state of an AI agent's execution environment.
Goal
Represents a Goal within the AI-Agent Framework.
InMemoryCache<K,V>
Abstract base class providing an in-memory cache implementation combining both Cache and CacheOperations interfaces for the AI-Agent Execution and Orchestration Platform.
InputException
Exception thrown when an AI agent or one of its services encounters input or validation errors.
InputOutputHandler
Interface representing the communication handler between an AI agent and the user in the AI-Agent Framework.
InternalServerException
Represents internal server-side exceptions that occur within the AI-Agent Framework.
LoggingData
Represents structured logging information for the AI-Agent Framework.
LoggingDataHolder
Thread-safe holder for LoggingData objects used in the AI-Agent Framework.
LoggingEncoder
Custom Logback encoder for transforming ILoggingEvent instances into enriched structured log messages within the AI-Agent Framework.
MarkerConstants
MarkerConstants defines a set of standardized SLF4J Marker instances used for categorizing and filtering logs throughout the application.
NoSQLDBConfiguration
Configuration class for setting up MongoDB connection for the AI-Agent Framework.
SimpleAgentInputOutputHandler
SimpleAgentInputOutputHandler is a concrete implementation of InputOutputHandler used within the AI-Agent Framework to facilitate communication between the agent and the user/environment.
SimpleCacheHandler<K,V>
A simple default cache handler implementation for the AI-Agent framework that extends AbstractCacheOperations.
State
Represents the runtime state of an AI agent within the AI-Agent Framework.
StatelessEnvironmentHandler
The StatelessEnvironmentHandler is the default implementation of the AI Agent Framework's Environment interface.
Status
Represents the status of a Goal or Task within the AI-Agent Framework.
StatusValues
Enum representing the lifecycle status values for tasks and goals within the AI-Agent Framework.
Task
Represents a Task within the AI-Agent Framework.
